channel.title: RSCD Database help!?!
channel.description:
Every time i go to import the rscd database i get this:
Error ---------------------------------------------------------- SQL query:
-- -- Databas: `rscd` -- -- -------------------------------------------------------- -- -- Struktur f�r tabell `bans` - - CREATE TABLE `ba ns ` ( `id ` i nt( 10 ) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT , `us ername ` v archar( 200 ) default NULL , `ip ` v archar( 255 ) default NULL , `em ail ` v archar( 50 ) default NULL , `me ssage ` v archar( 255 ) default NULL , `ex pire ` i nt( 10 ) unsigned default NULL , PRIMARY KEY ( `id `) ) ENGINE = MYISAM DEFAULT CHARSET = utf8 AUTO_INCREMENT =2;
MySQL said: Documentation #1046 - No database selected
^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
Please help and tell me how to fix this

item.title: RSCD Database help!?!
item.dc:creator: @elyad elyad
item.description:
@elyad wrote:

First create a database, name it ‘‘rscd’’ then import your rscd.sql to this.

Error

SQL query:

–
– Databas: rscd

–
– Struktur f�r tabell bans -

  • CREATE TABLE ba ns ( id i nt( 10 ) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT ,
    us ername v archar( 200 ) default NULL ,

    ex pire i nt( 10 ) unsigned default NULL ,
